Validation on rows

Source: R/assertions.R
validate_rows.Rd

Validation on rows

validate_rows(
  data,
  row_reduction_fn,
  predicate,
  ...,
  predicate_generator = NULL,
  obligatory = FALSE,
  description = NA,
  skip_chain_opts = FALSE,
  success_fun = assertr::success_append,
  error_fun = assertr::error_append,
  defect_fun = assertr::defect_append
)

Arguments

data

data.frame or tibble to test
row_reduction_fn

function for row reduction
predicate

Predicate functions from asserts package, e.g. in_set, within_bounds, etc.
...

other arguments to predicate function
predicate_generator

predicate generator function.
obligatory

flag setting assertion to mandatory
description

character with description of assertion
skip_chain_opts

flag to skip chain options
success_fun

function that is called after success
error_fun

function that is called after error
defect_fun

function that is called after defect

See also

validate_cols validate_if
